titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Rockefeller University records, Instruments FA240

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2019-10-16 01:44:51 -0400.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access note
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Types of records include: catalogs, instructions, printed material, and inventories.

did.unittitle: Catalogs of instruments from papers of individual scientists
American Cyanamid and Chemical Corp. Instructions for operating filt-r-stil
Baker Company 2 items on platinum ware
Black Light Eastern Corp. Pen-ray "mercury pencil" lamp & items
Electric Storage Battery Co. 1st ed., 8th ed
Eck & Krebs (Special list of laboratory glassware)
E. Machlett & Son 2 items mercury switches and equipment
U.S. National Bureau of Standards (Weights) Circ. 547 sect. 1
S.S. White Engineering Bulletin 38, 1938 Flexible shafts
Yellow Springs Instrument Co. Temperature controllers 2 items
Operating instructions for instruments from G.E. Perlmann papers

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Exact Folder Titles are general alphabetical ranges -- such as A-B, B-C, C-E, etc. -- rather than the item level description provided. When requesting materials, please refer to the specific box and folder for the records of interest. The specific content within the files will match with the Box and Folder numbers presented, although when retrieved, the individual folder titles (A-B) will be a broad alphabetical generalization of content.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Also includes some catalogs, (dated if known).

did.unittitle: Haake Constant Temperature Circulators (Models FJ and FE) (Polyscience Corp)
Lauda Table Model Kryomats (Low temperature circulators)
Thomas, Arthur H. (See Arthur H. Thomas)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes Okholm reprint "Conductivity method for the control of a soap dryer"
